description: My place is close to Rite Aid Pharmacy, Rego Park Center (Costco, Century 21, Toys 'R Us) , and Salute Kosher Restaurant. You’ll love my place because of the outdoors space, the neighborhood, and the comfy bed. My place is good for couples, business travelers, and families (with kids).
name: 1 BEDROOM IN GROUND FLOOR WITH BACKYARD
review:
You get what you pay more. 
We were uncomfortable using the towels cos it looks dirty. Overall the place was untidy. Wouldnt go back there
